questions.question: Research on mortality awareness suggests that:
options: Thinking about death always increases anxiety
Acknowledging mortality can increase life satisfaction and meaning
People should avoid thinking about death entirely
Death contemplation is only for spiritual practitioners

questions.question: Terror Management Theory suggests that:
options: Death anxiety has no effect on behavior
All humans share an awareness of mortality that affects many life choices
Only anxious people worry about death
Death anxiety cannot be addressed

questions.question: Death awareness can serve as a teacher by:
options: Making all pursuits seem meaningless
Clarifying what truly matters and what is trivial
Causing permanent depression
Only affecting elderly people

questions.question: The relationship between death awareness and love is that:
options: Love becomes less meaningful knowing it will end
Mortality awareness can deepen appreciation for loved ones
We should avoid loving to prevent grief
Death and love are completely unrelated

questions.question: Befriending mortality involves:
options: Eliminating all fear of death
Pretending death won't happen
Moving toward acceptance while acknowledging the difficulty
Becoming depressed about life's impermanence
